name: Reading and Interpreting French Literature: An Introduction to Literary Criticism
description: Techniques of literary criticism and analysis based on a detailed study of selected novels, drama and poetry in French literature. [24L]
prerequisites: FRE280Y5 or a minimum grade of 77% in FSL406H5 or equivalent, FRE240H5, FRE241H5 (or FRE240Y5) or permission of the department.
